item.title: ‘The Super Mario Bros. Movie’ has surpassed ‘Frozen’ to become the 2nd highest-grossing animated movie of all time.
item.author: popcrave

item.title:
The House has passed the debt ceiling bill negotiated by President Biden and Speaker Kevin McCarthy by a vote of 314-117.
It now heads to the Senate.
item.author: popcrave

item.title:
‘Freddy Krueger’ actor Robert Englund says he is officially done playing the horror icon:
“I’m too old and thick to play Freddy now. I just can’t do fight scenes for more than one take anymore, I’ve got a bad neck and bad back and arthritis in my right wrist. So I have to hang… Show more
item.author: popcrave

item.title:
A friend of Noor Alfallah, the woman pregnant with Al Pacino’s child, denies claims that Alfallah is a gold digger:
“She is very positive and not an opportunist. She loves old people and these guys are fascinating.”
: https://pagesix.com/2023/05/31/al-pacino-baby-mama-noor-alfallah-29-just-loves-old-people/?utm_medium=social&utm_campaign=pagesix&utm_source=twitter…
item.author: popcrave

item.title:
FaZe Clan issues statement in support of ‘Stranger Things’ actress and new member Grace Van Dien after defending herself against a misogynistic attack from streamer FaZe Rain:
“We stand by her.”
item.author: popcrave

item.title:
‘The Flash’ producer says the film was “never” at risk of being cancelled due to Ezra Miller's behavior.
: https://variety.com/2023/film/news/the-flash-shelved-ezra-miller-false-reports-1235629526/…
item.author: popcrave
